text: Sayed Ashraful Islam (1 January 1952 - 3 January 2019) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a member of the Awami League. He was a Member of Parliament and Minister of Public Administration of the Government of Bangladesh. Islam was Minister of Local Government and Rural Development. He was born in Mymensingh, East Bengal. In November 2018, Islam was diagnosed with stage-4 lung cancer.Ashraf seriously ill with cancerSyed Ashraf diagnosed with Stage 4 lung cancer He died two months later from the disease on 3 January 2019 in Bangkok, Thailand, aged 67.Minister Syed Ashraful Islam dies in Bangkok ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Mymensingh Division Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:Bangladeshi Muslims
title: Sayed Ashraful Islam
